name: character-parser
description: parse javascript one character at a time to look for snippets in templates.  this is not a validator, it's just designed to allow you to have sections of javascript delimited by brackets robustly.
kwds: parse javascript one character at a time to look for snippets in templates.  this is not a validator, it's just designed to allow you to have sections of javascript delimited by brackets robustly. parser javascript bracket nesting comment string escape escaping
